===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[first]]; [[ahead of time]]; [[before]]; [[beforehand]]
#: {{zh-x|我 要 先 去 洗手間。|I need to go to the bathroom '''first'''.}}
#: {{zh-x|我 要{jiu3} 去 廁{ci3}所 先。|I need to go to the bathroom '''first'''.|C}}
# {{rfdef|lang=zh}}
#: {{zh-x|佢 瞓 到 而家 先 瞓 醒 覺。|He slept so long that he only woke up just now.|C}}
#: {{zh-x|你 先 食 一 碗 飯 點 會 夠！|Eating one bowl isn't enough!|C}}
#: {{zh-x|呢{nei1}啲 先 係 唱歌。|''This'' is ''true'' singing.|C}}
#: {{zh-x|你 唔係 頭先 先 去 咗 咩。|Didn't you just go?|C}}
# {{lb|zh|Cantonese}} [[first off]]
#: {{zh-x|你 買 咗 未 先？|First off, have you even bought it yet?|C}}

====Usage notes====
* {{gloss|first; beforehand}} In Mandarin, {{lang|zh|先}} comes before the verb. In Cantonese, {{lang|zh|先}} comes after the verb.

====Synonyms====
* {{sense|first}} {{zh-l|首先}}, {{zh-l|最先}}, {{zh-l|第一}}
